name: Tarralyn Ramsey
description: '''Tarralyn LaJuan Ramsey''' (born July 8, 1979) is an American [[gospel music]]ian, songwriter and artist. She began her music career in 2000, with the release of the religious ''Tarralyn Ramsey'' album on [[Verity Records]]. This would be her [[Billboard (magazine)|''Billboard'' magazine]] breakthrough release on the [[Top Gospel Albums|Gospel Albums]] chart. Following her win on the [[VH1]] reality series ''Born to Diva'' in 2003, she signed with [[Casablanca Records]] and released her second album, ''Tarralyn'', which featured the single "Up Against All Odds".
